tool_description: Magento Quick View Extension enables your customers to view product details and checkout from home page or category page without visiting product page.  This module also enables you to browse other products within same lightbox. Customers can checkout as well.
name: Magento Quick View Extension
title: Magento Quick View Extension

api_list.name: Docs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simonwalker-magento-quick-view-extension.p.rapidapi.com/http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/product-quick-view.html/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simonwalker-magento-quick-view-extension.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
